text: @GovernorTomWolf My senses tell me Emperor #TomWolf is considering moving all counties to Yellow/Red phase. The spike in #covid19 is likely from the #GeorgeFloyd hysteria, but contact tracers couldnt ask any1 if they attended. Now Wolf is going to tell us we are out having too much fun! #Lockdown https://t.co/5jKu6Hs4aU
